name: Light Sword: Galaxy Pirates
description:
Pick your favorite Light Sword and step into amazing adventure while protecting the galaxy! Choose your side wisely and enjoy in this game which will surely take you on an epic journey. Evil forces are strong, but the force is stronger within you!

Choose your character and start the campaign against forces of evil and the dark side! But watch out, even though some players don’t have dark side weapon colors, they will attack you. They have gone rogue!

In Light Sword: Galaxy Pirates game you battle your enemies with the most powerful weapon in the universe and you can choose three different gameplays. Training is a single player mode, where you are constantly attacked. In training mode you will learn how to play and you can collect coins. You can play online multiplayer as a Deathmatch, where you go in alone and the goal is to get the best score.

Collect achievements, get a better ranking and earn some coins to buy a better weapon. Or invite your friends to play with you in Team Match mode.

The galaxy needs your protection!
